author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Love & care should be given freely/ voluntarily...if this is not the case, you might need to reconsider the Relationship!

text: A scary revelation this is...! https://t.co/jJysGEUgZX

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Never make a joke at someone else’s expense...it is simply unbecoming!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: The easiest way to confuse yourself; is by comparing yourself to others..!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: People usually have a strong for the truth because their reality is usually based on lies...!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Prioritizing your peace over proving a point is a form of self love!!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Dear youth; The ultimate form of stupidity is when you replicate your parents mistakes after they have repeatedly warned you!!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text:
Life in it's entirety, is seasonal! accepting this actuality makes dealing with each season bearable as they unfold...

Attempting to evade or resist the seasons of life yields nothing but suffering & makes life quite unbearable!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Sometimes to advance, you've got to be a fool...willingly!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Your soul has a voice, listen attentively...

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text:
We are all born with a natural need for affection & it is both awful & sad to see modern day folks strenuously endeavoring to restrain themselves so to evade this truth!

Well! I'm not saying it's unwise, but just sad to witness/ observe!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: What the f.....is this! 🤣 😂 😂 https://t.co/JsA3nYQMIv

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: For any relationship to work, there has to be some form of giving/ sacrifice...If the sacrifice feels to great, LEAVE as soon as you reach that realization!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Words possess the power to build or destroy...utilize them circumspectly!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text:
Surround yourself with people who's eyes brighten-up when they see you...

Surround yourself with people who understand you, even when you don't think you're making sense!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Been there...it's a crazy state to be in! https://t.co/fMJJBkPzcX

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Well stated! https://t.co/VsPPwQ0GOi

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text:
Dear young man: Continuously work on these 3 pillars 

Health, Mind & Wealth...

No told me, so i am telling you!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Focus on the people that matter most...!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: At some point, life will reveal who really matters, who never did, and who always will....pay careful attention!!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text:
“My experience is that the teachers we need most are the people we’re living with right now.” 

~ Byron Katie

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Common sense: You don't win/ succeed in the absences of effort!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Always treat others the exact way you would also want to be treated...!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Day made! 🤣 😂... https://t.co/YewyoJayHi

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Day dream.., it is good for the spirit/ soul!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Don’t waste your time on revenge. Those who hurt you will eventually face their own karma....!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Hope has saved many...!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Dont excuse an abusive relationship utilizing "Happy moments"

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Don't become what you hate to hurt what you hate...it will back-fire badly!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: If you always truthful & honest with yourself you wont have difficulty with WALKING AWAY the moment their actions offend your...!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Not one incident or episode of your life should ever be considered useless...we learn & grow through all that takes place in our lives!!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Be as realistic as you want but remember; A negative mind will never give you a positive life....!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Young men & young lady, take your time...every choice you make shapes your future!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text:
The only person that can stop your toxic pattern is yourself. 

Be honest with yourself....

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: A boy becomes a man when he stops blaming others for his problems...

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text:
Modern day Prophets declare to be spiritual-leaders/ guiders...

How do you guide me [spiritually] when you are a mere sinner yourself? How do i look to a sinner for spiritual purity?

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: This truth is not preached loudly enough! https://t.co/aC2qjIRGS0

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Fond your purpose, if you can't find one...then create one!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Musing is okay BUT moving is always better...!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: The inception is always the hardest. Never let-up...!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text:
Paulo Coelho once said, "Anyone who loves in the expectation of being loved in return is wasting their time"

A emotionally confusing but factual sentiment...!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Learn to say NO with a smile & friendly eyes!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Self-esteem...preach it to the young & upcoming!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Regardless of what the world approves of, never turn against your own self...

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Holding & possessing positive emotions...will see you reap as you sow!!

author: Mseleku, Duma, Lwandle
text: Culture is mainly created to solve problems with families/ communities...any part of culture that no longer serves this purpose should be withdrawn!!

text: Don't feed what doesn't add value to your life....
